item.description:
We've been working with McFadden's staff to come up with a great Newcomers event for everyone!

This event includes:
* Our own semi-private area of the bar
* A round of complimentary apps
* 1/2 priced appetizers
* $3 drink specials


Please read carefully!!!

If you would like to attend this event, please vote for the top 2 appetizers you would like the most off of the McFadden's menu in the "Polls" section of this web site. We will receive 1 complimentary appetizer for every 4 people in attendance. The apps will be set up before the event and served buffet-style. I will request the most popular apps to be put out.

You will order 1/2 priced appetizers separately from your server or bartender.

$3 drink specials include:
- All beers except Bud/Bud Light and Guinness
- Jack Daniels, Captain, Bacardi, Smirnoff
- The house red and white wine
[please double-check with server/bartender if what you order is a drink special]

APPETIZER AND DRINK SPECIALS END AT 8:30 PM

Any questions, please email me.
item.how_to_find_us: ask for the newcomers meetup.com event
item.name: Apps & Drinks @ McFadden's
